articles.title: Blog about Data Science in R
articles.description: Welcome to my blog about Data Science! I love to play with data and try to understand the world through the lens of Statistics, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. I also love to learn, to teach and to create. Having a personal blog optimally combines these three passions. And all of this is possible with R and RStudio. That's why I love R!

articles.title: Consulting and Tutoring in R
articles.description: If you're seeking statistical assistance for any of the topics listed below, take a moment to explore the provided links and ensure they align with your requirements. If possible, attempt to implement the analyses on your own. It's both cost-free and well-explained. Should you still find yourself in need of support, feel free to reach out to me via email with a Subject "CONSULTING IN R": yzablotski@icloud.com
articles.contents:
Contents
Classic Statistical Tests
Data Wrangling and Pre-Processing
Exploratory Data Analysis
Data Visualisation
Statistical Modelling
Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence

Classic Statistical Tests
One-sample Student’s t-test and One-sample Wilcoxon test
Two-Samples Student’s t-Test & Two-Samples Welch’s t-Test
Two-Samples Mann-Whitney U Test = Wilcoxon Rank Sum Test
Paired Samples t-Test
Paired Samples Wilcoxon Signed Rank Test
Correlation Analysis: Pearson, Spearman, Robust, Bayesian
Correlation Matrix
One-Way ANOVA: Fisher’s, Welch’s, Bayesian, Robust
Kruskal-Wallis test: Non-Parametric Alternative to ANOVA
One-Way Repeated Measures ANOVA
Friedman Test: Non-Parametric Alternative to RM ANOVA
Chi-Square Test + pairwise post-hoc tests
McNemar Test: Dependend Samples Alternative for Chi-Square
Cochran’s Q Test + Pairwise McNemar Tests (post-hoc)
Data Wrangling and Pre-Processing
Learn What Tidy Data Is
Clean Your Data Lightly with {janitor}
Basic Data Wrangling with {dplyr}
Advanced Data Wrangling with {dplyr}
Tidy Up Data
{dplyr} on Steroids: Handling Data Bases
Exploratory Data Analysis
Quick Exploratory Data Analysis with {DataExplorer}
Diagnose, Explore and Repair Your Data with {dlookr}
DEEP! Exploratory Data Analysis in R
Data Visualisation
Bar Plots with {ggplot2}
Visualize Data And Model Results
Statistical Modelling
Robust Regression: don’t depend on outliers!
Conduct Many Models with Nested (Grouped) Data
Non-Parametric Bootstrapped Regression: Alternative for Ordinary Linear Regression
Quantile Regression as the most useful Alternative for Ordinary Linear Regression
Squeeze Hidden Knowledge out of Models with Game-Changing {emmeans}
Model Interactions: Two-Way (bivariable) Analysis
Check Quality And Assumptions of Your Model
Publication-Ready Tables of Data, Stat-Tests and Models + Tables of Individual Tests & Models
Visualize Model Results and Assumptions
Report (interpret) Results of Statistical Tests & Models
Find The Best Model: Automated Model Selection and Multimodel Inference as Alternative to Stepwise (backwards) Selection
Survival Analysis 1: Kaplan-Meier Curves
Survival Analysis 2: parametric survival models
Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
Impute Missing Values
Effective Resampling for Machine Learning with {rsample}
